title: Shijima Station
text:
is a railway station on the <a href="Hokuriku%20Railroad%20Ishikawa%20Line">Hokuriku Railroad Ishikawa Line</a> in the city of <a href="Kanazawa">Kanazawa</a>, <a href="Ishikawa%20Prefecture">Ishikawa Prefecture</a>, Japan, operated by the <a href="private%20railway">private railway</a> operator <a href="Hokuriku%20Railroad">Hokuriku Railroad</a> (Hokutetsu).
Lines.
Shijima Station is served by the 13.8 km Hokuriku Railroad Ishikawa Line between and , and is 8.2 km from the starting point of the line at .
Station layout.
The station consists of one <a href="side%20platform">side platform</a> serving a single bi-directional track. The station is unattended.
History.
Shijima Station opened on 22 June 1915.
